KRISTINA CALUMPONG
  • Portfolio
  • About Me

Nice to Meet You! I'm Kristina- Half White, Half Filipina. Born and raised in Kansas City, MO now living in Los Angeles, CA. Much older than I look, goofier than you'd expect, and sometimes I laugh too loud. Good at keeping others secrets, bad at keeping my own. Some have said that I never let the grass grow too much under my feet. If I'm not coding, I am in spanish class or at singing lesson. Or traveling. So far I've traveled to 20 countries.

How I found my love for coding... I built my first website on Wordpress in hopes of being a travel blogger. I quickly realized that path wasn't for me but that I really enjoyed building websites. This led me to taking classes at General Assembly and UCLA Extension. Though it has been an incredibly challenging skill to crack, I can say I feel validated in my choice to pursue it.



Technical Skills

ReactJS | JS ES6 | HTML5 | CSS3 | Deployment | SQL | Node | Express
